data_table.description: Cerebral Micro Bleeds (CMB) by Head MRI, Original and Offspring, scans done from 12/2000 - 6/2009. This dataset corresponds to the follow-up MRI for the CS2 cycle. This dataset only includes participants who have information on cerebral micro bleed status, not all participants who had an MRI for CS2. There are some participants who only completed scans in the CS2 cycle and did not have the baseline CS1 scan.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form the study participant's ID number.

variable.name: cmb
variable.comment: A CMB is any cerebrovascular accident of type="hemorrhage" and size="micro" Other types/sizes of cerebrovascular accidents are not considered CMBs.
variable.value: Unknown (due to trauma or unanalyzable scan)

variable.name: cmb_number
variable.description: Counter variable to indicate number of occurrences of CMB for a given MRI date

variable.name: cmb_side
variable.description: Side of brain that CMB occurred

variable.name: lobar
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as lobar if it is located in any of the following regions: frontal cortex, frontal white matter, occipital cortex, occipital white matter, parietal cortex, parietal white matter, temporal cortex, temporal white matter.
variable.value: Unknown, no CMB present or missing

variable.name: deep
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as deep if it is located in any of the following regions: basal ganglia, brainstem, caudate, thalamus, cerebellum

variable.name: exclude_trauma
variable.description: Observation should be excluded due to presence or trauma on MRI scan

variable.name: exclude_error
variable.description: Observation should be excluded due to unanalyzable MRI scan

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: MRI_DATE includes month, day and year, however, coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
